snippet.title: Blanc | Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Blanc is an artistic cooperative adventure that follows the journey of a wolf cub and a fawn stranded in a vast, snowy wilderness. The pair must come together in an unlikely partnership to find their families. 

Coming to Nintendo Switch, Epic Games Store and Steam February 2023. 
BlancTheGame.com

#blanc #gameplay #indie
